00036   // Bit masks for all pkt types
00037   namespace protected_PSP {
00038     static const int32_t CONTROL_CE_BIT  = 0x80000000; // Bit 31
00039     static const int32_t CONTROL_IE_BIT  = 0x40000000; // Bit 30
00040     static const int32_t CONTROL_CR_BIT  = 0x20000000; // Bit 29
00041     static const int32_t CONTROL_IR_BIT  = 0x10000000; // Bit 28
00042     static const int32_t CONTROL_A_BIT   = 0x08000000; // Bit 27
00043     static const int32_t CONTROL_P_BIT   = 0x04000000; // Bit 26
00044     static const int32_t CONTROL_W_BIT   = 0x02000000; // Bit 25
00045     static const int32_t CONTROL_E_BIT   = 0x01000000; // Bit 24
00046     static const int32_t CONTROL_NK_BIT  = 0x00800000; // Bit 23
00047     static const int32_t CONTROL_QV_BIT  = 0x00400000; // Bit 22
00048     static const int32_t CONTROL_QX_BIT  = 0x00200000; // Bit 21
00049     static const int32_t CONTROL_QS_BIT  = 0x00100000; // Bit 20
00050     static const int32_t ACK_SX_BIT      = 0x00080000; // Bit 19
00051     static const int32_t ACK_P_BIT       = 0x00040000; // Bit 18
00052     static const int32_t ACK_W_BIT       = 0x00020000; // Bit 17
00053     static const int32_t ACK_E_BIT       = 0x00010000; // Bit 16
00054     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_15 = 0x00008000; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00055     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_14 = 0x00004000; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00056     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_13 = 0x00002000; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00057     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_12 = 0x00001000; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00058     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_11 = 0x00000800; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00059     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_10 = 0x00000400; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00060     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_9  = 0x00000200; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00061     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_8  = 0x00000100; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00062     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_7  = 0x00000080; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00063     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_6  = 0x00000040; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00064     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_5  = 0x00000020; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00065     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_4  = 0x00000010; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00066     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_3  = 0x00000008; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00067     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_2  = 0x00000004; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00068     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_1  = 0x00000002; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00069     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_0  = 0x00000001; // Bits 0..15 are reserved
00070   } END_NAMESPACE // protected_PSP namespace

00083   // XXX - Note: HasFields implementation may be complicated for ControlPacket w/ conflicts b/t Context and Command

00163     public: virtual inline void setPacketType (PacketType t) {
00164       if (t != PacketType_Command) {
00165         throw VRTException("Can not change packet type to non-Command type when using BasicCommandPacket");
00166       }
00167       BasicVRTPacket::setPacketType(t);
00168     }

00292 
00293     // HELPERS
00294     protected: virtual int32_t getCtrlAckSettingsField () const {
00295       return VRTMath::unpackInt(bbuf, getHeaderLength());
00296     }
00297     protected: virtual bool getCtrlAckSettingsBit (int32_t bit) const {
00298       return ((getCtrlAckSettingsField() & bit) != 0);
00299     }
00300     protected: virtual void setCtrlAckSettingsBit (int32_t bit, bool set);
